original_text: Your ancestors did bad things to every prophet that God sent to them. They even killed the prophets who told them about the Righteous Man that God would send. Now you have given that Man to his enemies. You have made them kill him.
korean_text: 너희 조상들이 선지자들 중의 누구를 박해하지 아니하였느냐 의인이 오시리라 예고한 자들을 그들이 죽였고 이제 너희는 그 의인을 잡아 준 자요 살인한 자가 되나니

sentences.original_text: to every prophet that God sent to them
who told them about the Righteous Man
Now you have given that Man to his enemies
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 너희는 그 사람을 그의 원수들에게 넘겼다

sentences.original_text: You have made them kill him
